content.text:
# The Battle and Fall of Przemysl

The Battle and Fall of Przemysl is a 1915 documentary war film shot on the Eastern Front by official war photographer to the Central Powers, Albert K. Dawson. Its four reels depicted the Siege of Przemy≈õl, disastrous for the Austrians, with incidents reenacted using soldiers as extras. Most of the film has been lost.
